meanings.definition: A one-horse carriage used in India.
meanings.sent1: The ekka slowly made its way down the dusty road.
meanings.sent2: We saw an ekka parked outside the market.
meanings.sent3: The ekka driver wore a colorful turban.
meanings.sent4: The ekka moved like a gentle breeze through the village.
meanings.sent5: Children waved excitedly as the ekka passed by.

meanings.definition: A type of small, two-wheeled cart.
meanings.sent1: The farmers loaded their produce onto the ekka.
meanings.sent2: The ekka rattled along the bumpy path.
meanings.sent3: The ekka driver whistled a merry tune.
meanings.sent4: The ekka stood out among the other carts in the market.
meanings.sent5: The wooden wheels of the ekka creaked as it moved.

meanings.sent1: He found an old ekka in his collection of coins.
meanings.sent2: The ekka was minted in the early 1900s.
meanings.sent3: The ekka was a rare find for the collector.
meanings.sent4: The ekka gleamed in the sunlight.
meanings.sent5: The ekka was worth more than he expected.
